verses.verse: When Yisra'EL <WH3478> was a child <WH5288>, then I loved <WH157> <WH8799> him, and called <WH7121> <WH8804> my son <WH1121> out of Egypt <WH4714>.

As they called <WH7121> <WH8804> them, so they went <WH1980> <WH8804> from them <WH6440>: they sacrificed <WH2076> <WH8762> unto Baalim <WH1168>, and burned incense <WH6999> <WH8762> to graven images <WH6456>.
I taught <WH8637> Efrayim <WH669> also to go <WH8637> <WH8809>, taking <WH3947> <WH8800> them by their arms <WH2220>; but they knew <WH3045> <WH8804> not that I healed <WH7495> <WH8804> them.

I drew <WH4900> <WH8799> them with cords <WH2256> of a man <WH120>, with bands <WH5688> of love <WH160>: and I was to them as they that take off <WH7311> <WH8688> the yoke <WH5923> on their jaws <WH3895>, and I laid <WH5186> <WH8686> meat <WH398> <WH8686> unto them.
He shall not return <WH7725> <WH8799> into the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, but the Ashurn <WH804> shall be his king <WH4428>, because they refused <WH3985> <WH8765> to return <WH7725> <WH8800>.

And the sword <WH2719> shall abide <WH2342> <WH8804> on his cities <WH5892>, and shall consume <WH3615> <WH8765> his branches <WH905>, and devour <WH398> <WH8804> them, because of their own counsels <WH4156>.

And my people <WH5971> are bent <WH8511> <WH8803> to backsliding <WH4878> from me: though they called <WH7121> <WH8799> them to Ha `Elyon <WH5920>, none at all <WH3162> would exalt <WH7311> <WH8787> him.

How shall I give thee up <WH5414> <WH8799>, Efrayim <WH669>? how shall I deliver <WH4042> <WH8762> thee, Yisra'EL <WH3478>? how shall I make <WH5414> <WH8799> thee as Admah <WH126>? how shall I set <WH7760> <WH8799> thee as Zeboim <WH6636>? mine heart <WH3820> is turned <WH2015> <WH8738> within me, my repentings <WH5150> are kindled <WH3648> <WH8738> together <WH3162>.

I will not execute <WH6213> <WH8799> the fierceness <WH2740> of mine anger <WH639>, I will not return <WH7725> <WH8799> to destroy <WH7843> <WH8763> Efrayim <WH669>: for I am 'Elohim <WH410>, and not man <WH376>; HaKadosh <WH6918> in the midst <WH7130> of thee: and I will not enter <WH935> <WH8799> into the city <WH5892>.

They shall walk <WH3212> <WH8799> after <WH310> the YY <WH3068>: he shall roar <WH7580> <WH8799> like a lion <WH738>: when he shall roar <WH7580> <WH8799>, then the children <WH1121> shall tremble <WH2729> <WH8799> from the west <WH3220>.

They shall tremble <WH2729> <WH8799> as a bird <WH6833> out of Egypt <WH4714>, and as a dove <WH3123> out of the land <WH776> of Ashur <WH804>: and I will place <WH3427> <WH8689> them in their houses <WH1004>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH3068>.

Efrayim <WH669> compasseht <WH5437> <WH8804> me about with lies <WH3585>, and the house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> with deceit <WH4820>: but Y'hudah <WH3063> yet ruleth <WH7300> <WH8804> with 'Elohim <WH410>, and is faithful <WH539> <WH8737> with the saints <WH6918>.
